name: The Weathermachine
description:
THE WEATHERMACHINE

When an old sailor is trapped during a storm, he remembers a little device which he uses to ease his adventures. Figure out how to use it and help a seagull in the process.

--------
"The Weathermachine" is based on the short little game I created in about 20 minutes during the Code Week MOOC. For this version, I added sound and some graphical details.
